trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> oggetto contiene una raccolta di <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> object contains the details of an individual attribute within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> oggetto contiene i dettagli di un singolo attributo all'interno della configurazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> oggetto derivato da associato <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare la <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensionale che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati dall'insieme <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzazione di <see cref="T:System.Array" /> deve essere in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in <c>array</c> in corrispondenza del quale ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" /> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'intero insieme <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> compatibile unidimensionale, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Array.Length" /> property of <paramref name="array" /> is less than <see cref="P:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.Count" /> + <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Array.Length" /> di <paramref name="array" /> è minore di <see cref="P:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.Count" /> + <paramref name="index" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object, which is used to iterate through this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> utilizzato per scorrere l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object, which is used to iterate through this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />, utilizzato per scorrere l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that contains the information required to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> che contiene le informazioni necessarie a serializzare l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> che contiene l'origine e la destinazione del flusso serializzato associato all'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> i dati necessari per serializzare l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="info" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration attribute contained in the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" />
trans-unit.target: Nome dell'attributo di configurazione contenuto nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection" />

trans-unit.source: object.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation" /> object in the collection, based on the specified property name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation" /> dell'insieme, in base al nome di proprietà specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation" />.
